text:
He has been in the Kard for a while, but the decision to finally close DASH, the store that first put the Family on the retail map, it may not have been easy to do.

Well, not of all the Kardashian sisters anyway.

In September 2016, on an excursion in New York with son Mason daughter Penelope and niece North West and with friend Jonathan Cheban ] in tow, Kourtney Kardashian visited the location of DASH's SoHo, which opened in 2010, and quickly declared herself transported to 2009.

Kourtney no longer saw the style of her and her sisters in DASH and thought that a major update was necessary. But the idea of ​​not having DASH at all did not even occur to him.
title: The end of a Kardashian era: within the decision to close DASH and the expansion of the family brand – TECH2
